name: Potato and Mustard Greens Salad
author: Chef John
summary: This is no beginner's potato salad. Mustard greens are spicy, slightly bitter, and not at all subtle.
ingredients: 2 ½ pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and halved
1 teaspoon sambal oelek (Thai chile paste) or plain hot sauce
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 cup washed and cut mustard greens
directions: Boil potatoes and garlic in a large pot of salted water until just tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Drain and let cool to room temperature
Whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, olive oil, and sambal oelek together in a large bowl
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Roughly chop cooled potatoes into a large bowl
Cover and set aside in the refrigerator for 1 hour
Season with salt and pepper to taste
